TopicTitle: Fix the "MK 1 Divert-less Supersonic Intake" transparency

Articles.Content:
In KSP 1.0.5 while playing around with the ne features, I noticed that the new model for the MK 1 Divert-less Supersonic Intake (The inline 1.25m intake) is hollow. I think that this is absolutely awesome because it makes it seem like air is actually going into the engine, the only thing is that in the SPH you can't see through the hole from the front.

The front of the intake, notice the black:
